name: Scary House (itch)
description:
I tried making a weird RPG Maker horror/jokes thing, again!

This one runs in browser!

It turns out it's hard to make an RPGMaker game run in browser! Okay fine! Download only!

It has real content warnings!

(blood, body horror-ish stuff, a spider-ish thing)

I got lazy near the end! It probably works though!
